content: shrug it off girl by tracy moncrief yarn malabrigo merino worsted and malabrigo lace pictures done in overdyed pink frost materials 1 1 2 skeins malabrigo merino worsted 1 1 1 skein malabrigo lace in same shade or contrasting shade hook h/8 5 0 mm uk 6 for edging us f 5 3 75 mm uk 8 size s m l approximately size 5 7 9 for girls i made medium about a size 7 main stitch fan lace from the encyclopedia of crochet techniques by jan eaton gauge in pattern chain 135 147 159 foundation row rs 1 double_crochet into 4th chain from hook 1 double_crochet into each chain to end turn row 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet into first double_crochet chain 2 skip next 3 double_crochet single_crochet into next 4th double_crochet chain 5 skip next 3 double_crochet single_crochet into next 4th double_crochet chain 2 skip next 3 double_crochet *5 double_crochet into next 4th double_crochet chain 2 skip next 3 double_crochet single_crochet into next 4th double_crochet chain 5 skip next 3 double_crochet single_crochet into next 4th double_crochet chain 2 skip next 3 double_crochet repeat from * ending with 3 double_crochet into 3rd of beginning skipped chain 3 turn row 2 chain 4 skip first double_crochet 1 double_crochet into next double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet into next double_crochet chain 2 skip ch2 space single_crochet into chain 5 space chain 2 * double_crochet into next double_crochet chain 1 4 times double_crochet into next double_crochet so in total you have a double_crochet in each double_crochet with a chain 1 on the inside of each double_crochet in the fan chain 2 skip next chain 2 space single_crochet into next chain 5 space chain 2 repeat from * around to last 2 double_crochet double_crochet into next double_crochet chain 1 twice 1 double_crochet into
